briefTitle: Study of Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of FCN-437c in Combination With Fulvestrant or Letrozole+Goserelin
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Antitumor Activity, Safety, and Pharmacokinetic Profile of FCN-437c in Combination With Fulvestrant or Letrozole + Goserelin in Female Patients With ER+, HER2- Advanced Breast Cancer
